channel.title: Prasad's Space on
channel.description: Recent content in Prasad's Space on

item.title: Distributed Transactions 101: Understanding Two-Phase Commit
item.description: A beginner-friendly guide to transactions, focusing on the two-phase commit protocol for distributed systems.

item.title: Industrial Automation 101: PLCs, MQTT, and Python in Action
item.description: A first-principles guide to integrating PLCs, MQTT, and Python for modern industrial automation systems.

item.title: Networking: From Packets to Protocols
item.description: A first-principles guide to understanding computer networking from physical transmission to application protocols.
